title: Missing Key Fragment
body: A few matches ago I won the game and it said that I had gotten a key fragment from that match, but when I went to go and craft a key since it was my third one, it said I still only had two key fragments.

replies.body: It sounds weird that you would receive a notification for a fragment but not see it in your inventory, so I took a look into this for you.  It looks like the last time you had 3 fragments were about 2 weeks ago, and fused into a chest.  Since then, only 2 key fragments were obtained.  I wasn't able to see anything missing here, but hopefully that helps clear things up!
Alright, so it was probably just a text bug. Anyway, thanks for the help
